personalInfo.name: Austin Cole
personalInfo.title: Deputy Director / Chief Information Security Officer
personalInfo.summary: Experienced IT leader with over 20 years of experience in cybersecurity, infrastructure management, and emergency preparedness. Currently serving as Deputy IT Director and Chief Information Security Officer for Latah County, Idaho. Passionate about leveraging technology to strengthen communities and enhance emergency response capabilities. Active in amateur radio, emergency management, and nonprofit leadership.

experience.title: Deputy Director / Chief Information Security Officer (CISO)
responsibilities: Lead cybersecurity initiatives and information security program for county government
Oversee IT infrastructure, systems administration, and technology strategic planning
Provide critical on-call support for life safety operations including Sheriff's Office and 911 dispatch
Manage and support radio systems and CAD (Computer Aided Dispatch) systems for public safety
Coordinate emergency communications and disaster recovery planning
Supervise IT staff and provide technical leadership across departments
Manage IT budget, vendor relationships, and compliance requirements

experience.title: Sr. System Administrator
responsibilities: Managed mixed Linux/Windows server environments with emphasis on high availability and security
Implemented firewalls, VPNs, and network troubleshooting for critical infrastructure and public safety systems
Provided 24/7 on-call support for critical life safety operations including Sheriff's Office and 911 dispatch
Supported radio systems and CAD systems essential for emergency response operations
Oversaw system backups, disaster recovery operations, and data integrity for county services
Collaborated with county departments to align IT solutions with operational needs

experience.title: IT Systems Administrator
responsibilities: Configured and maintained servers, ensuring network stability and operational efficiency
Provided on-call IT support for critical public safety systems and emergency services
Administered key services including web, SFTP, DNS, and VPN servers
Supported radio communications and CAD systems for law enforcement and emergency dispatch
Managed phone systems, streamlining communication across county departments

experience.title: System Technician
responsibilities: Provided technical support and troubleshooting for county systems
Assisted with network administration and maintenance
Supported hardware and software installations
Maintained IT documentation and inventory

experience.title: MSP Owner / Web Developer / Cybersecurity Specialist
responsibilities: Operate managed service provider business serving small to medium businesses
Manage Windows and Linux enterprise environments with specialized expertise in Linux systems
Provide device troubleshooting, hardware repairs, and system upgrades
Design and implement network infrastructure, consulting on optimal solutions
Administer servers, domains, and hosting services for client environments
Develop custom web applications and provide cybersecurity consulting services
Implement security assessments, vulnerability testing, and compliance solutions
Deliver comprehensive IT services including 24/7 support and managed infrastructure

experience.title: IT Specialist
responsibilities: Network administration and technical support roles
Hardware and software troubleshooting
Database management and reporting
Customer service and user training

roles.title: President & Founder
roles.description: Community technology and emergency preparedness nonprofit

roles.title: President & Founder
roles.description: Amateur radio club focused on digital communications

certifications: Red Cross CPR/First Aid/AED, Trauma & EMR Instructor
